properties.name: spring.data.mongodb.primary.uri
properties.description: connection uri of mongoDB server with order database.

properties.name: spring.data.mongodb.secondary.uri
properties.description: connection uri of mongoDB server with ticket database.

properties.name: spring.data.mongodb.primary.database
properties.description: database name of mongoDB server that order service uses.

properties.name: spring.data.mongodb.secondary.database
properties.description: database name of mongoDB server that ticket service uses.
